title: What to do if Your Medicine Isn't Available & Alternative Medicine
itunes:title: What to do if Your Medicine Isn't Available & Alternative Medicine
description: What if you couldn't get medicine from the store? What would you do? We're discussing different options for alternative medicines, like growing and using medicinal herbs at home, as well as supply and supply issues with our modern medicinal system. For more information, links and shownotes visit melissaknorris.com/324.
